quote: When price dropped, they dont want to praise the government. But when it rises, they blame the governmentâ€¦ This is not fair as it is due to weather conditions.
author: Najib Razak

quote: Malaysia tidak pernah dijajah, sebaliknya, hanya dinaungi atau dilindungi oleh British.
author: Zainal Kling

quote: Had a good chat yesterday with Mark Zuckerberg at Twitter HQ.
author: Najib Razak

quote: Beli sendiri guna duit menabung dari kecil
author: Rosmah

quote: We are all Malaysians. This is the bond that unites us. Let us always remember that unity is our fundamental strength as a people and as a nation.
author: Tunku Abdul Rahman

quote: Life in this world is short. Let us make use of our lives in the pursuit of happiness and not trouble.
author: Tunku Abdul Rahman
